00103 
00104 
00105 // shims
00106 // the rule with shims is that the upper module to shim connection
00107 // uses the fifos that it would usually use to talk to the lower module
00108 // the lower module to shim connection uses the shim fifos
00109 // Conceptually, then, the tcp_shim "belongs to" tcp_module
00110 //
00111 // The rule is that when connecting to an upper module, the
00112 // lower module should check to see if the datapath is named in
00113 // MINET_SHIMS if it is, then it should connect to the shim instead of to the
00114 // upper module
00115 //
00116 // the shim fifo name is the standard fifo name with shim_ prefixed
00117 // 
00118 // ./fifos/tcp2sock -> ./fifos/tcp2sock_shim
00119 //
00120 
00121 
00122 #endif
